options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642198255) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642200055)
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(octetDeltaCount) as bytes, egressNetworkPolicyName as source, ingressNetworkPolicyName as destination, ingressNetworkPolicyName as destinationIP
From flows_policy_view
WHERE $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds) 
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator') 
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
GROUP BY source, destination
HAVING bytes != 0

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount),  (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount),  (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642198301) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642200101)
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount) as bytes, egressNetworkPolicyName as source, ingressNetworkPolicyName as destination, ingressNetworkPolicyName as destinationIP
From flows_policy_view
WHERE $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
GROUP BY source, destination
HAVING bytes != 0

panels.title: Cumulative Reverse Bytes of Network Policy

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) as time,
    CONCAT(egressNetworkPolicyName, '->', ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair, 
    SUM(throughput)
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) AS flowEndSeconds,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName,
        AVG(throughput) AS throughput
    FROM flows_policy_view
    WHERE (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
    AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
    GROUP BY
        flowEndSeconds,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName
    HAVING throughput > 0
    ORDER BY flowEndSeconds
)
GROUP BY
    time,
    pair
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) as time,
    CONCAT(egressNetworkPolicyName, '->', ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair, 
    SUM(reverseThroughput)
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) AS flowEndSeconds,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName,
        AVG(reverseThroughput) AS reverseThroughput
    FROM flows_policy_view
    WHERE (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
    AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
    GROUP BY
        flowEndSeconds,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName
    HAVING reverseThroughput > 0
    ORDER BY flowEndSeconds
)
GROUP BY
    time,
    pair
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode) as time,
    egressNetworkPolicyName, 
    SUM(throughput)
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode) AS flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName,
        AVG(throughput) AS throughput
    FROM flows_policy_view
    WHERE egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
    AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode)
    GROUP BY
        flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName
    HAVING throughput > 0
    ORDER BY flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode
)
GROUP BY
    time,
    egressNetworkPolicyName
ORDER BY time

SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), egressNetworkPolicyName
FROM flows_policy_view
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode)
GROUP BY egressNetworkPolicyName
HAVING SUM(octetDeltaCount) != 0

panels.title: Cumulative Bytes of Egress Network Policy

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode) as time,
    ingressNetworkPolicyName, 
    SUM(throughput)
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode) AS flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName,
        AVG(throughput) AS throughput
    FROM flows_policy_view
    WHERE ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
    AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode)
    GROUP BY
        flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode,
        sourceIP,
        destinationIP,
        egressNetworkPolicyName,
        ingressNetworkPolicyName
    HAVING throughput > 0
    ORDER BY flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode
)
GROUP BY
    time,
    ingressNetworkPolicyName
ORDER BY time

SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), ingressNetworkPolicyName
FROM flows_policy_view
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode)
GROUP BY ingressNetworkPolicyName
HAVING SUM(octetDeltaCount) != 0

panels.title: Cumulative Bytes of Ingress Network Policy
